body: Hello, my name is Jason, or as you may/may not know be my my in-game name InputIGNHere or my PREVIOUS username Mc_TheCreeperJH I am a long-time Avicus Network fan. This is the best server I have played on.I believe I started about one or two years ago until I lost the server. Yes, I was a kid back then, but I really liked the DTM gamemodes. But then, about 2-3 months ago, something sparked me to re-find this server. So I google searched Obsidian breaking server,ffa obsidian breaking servers, etc. etc. Then one month later, I found this server, I tested to see if it was true. Then, when I joined, I recognized the spawn, everything! That was when I realized I found the server I was looking for. Now that I re-found my favorite server and gamemode I will never forget you. Thanks for reading.(BTW I currently have a yt too! https://www.youtube.com/jasoryeh) -Jason

Welcome back to the server, I hope you have fun.
